TopicTitle: Keyboard and mouse on Xbox and ps4

Articles.Content:
We console players need keyboard and mouse!!! Building launching and landing tickets are way easier to do with keyboard and mouse. The controller your all over the place trying to place pieces together while the mouse you have total control of the rocket making it easier to pilot. The mouse and keyboard is more convenient than controller itself. This topic has been going aroud since the game came to Xbox and ps4. And I’m pretty sure every console player wants keyboard and mouse. Please add keyboard and mouse for ksp!

 

Listen to the community!!!

add keyboard and mouse for consoles!
Don't know about mouse, but the keyboard is functional on the Xbox chatpad in the latest update.
